name: F1 Racing Championship
synopsis: Officially licensed by Formula One Administration Limited, F1 RACING Championship is the most realistic, challenging and exciting game ever released on N64!  -All the latest teams, cars and tracks of the 1999 Formula 1 season -"Pick up and Play" and "Simulation" modes with multi game play options -Advanced Artificial Intelligence System -Incredible special effects -Unique Driving school mode to help you master Formula One Driving -Multiplayer action
